mapper.select: SELECT d.*, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM discussion d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.id WHERE d.problem_id = #{problemId} ORDER BY d.created_at DESC

SELECT d.*, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, p.title as problemTitle FROM discussion d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN problem p ON d.problem_id = p.id (d.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR CAST(d.problem_id AS CHAR) = #{keyword}) ORDER BY d.updated_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM discussion d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN problem p ON d.problem_id = p.id (d.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR CAST(d.problem_id AS CHAR) = #{keyword})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discussion (problem_id, user_id, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{problemId}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
